title: Logan
body:
<<set $morgueCall to true>>
Logan: Why have you come to see me, officer?
<<if visited("Logan.LastNight") is false>>
[[I understand you were in Jacob Wright's apartment last night|Logan.LastNight]]
[[I think you have something to do with it Mr Rutledge|Logan.Accuse]]
<<else>>
[[I have more questions about last night|Logan.LastNight]]
[[Nothing yet. I'm going to look around|Logan.Exit]]
<<endif>>

title: Logan.LastNight
body:
Logan: We often shared a drink in his apartment.
Logan: Last night was no different.
<<set $loganIsSuspect to true>>
<<if visited ("Lola.ArguingDetail") is true>>
[[I spoke with one of the cleaning staff. She said she heard an argument|Logan.Argument]]
<<endif>>
<<if visited ("Jonas.FaceInjuries") is true>>
[[Mr Wright had some heavy bruising on his face. What do you know about that?|Logan.Punched]]
<<endif>>
<<if visited ("Jonas.Gunshot") is true>>
[[Mr Wright had a bullet wound in his stomach. What do you know about that?|Logan.Gunshot]]
<<endif>>
[[What else can you tell me about the night?|Logan.Night]]
[[May I look around a bit please?|Logan.Exit]]

title: Logan.Argument
body:
Logan: We argued over Jacob's business. He was putting himself at great risk with the deals he was making.
Logan: I tried to convince him to change course before something went wrong.
Logan: The argument got a little... heated. I didn't kill him though!
<<if visited ("Bandages") is true>>
[[I found some recently used bandages in your bathroom, what can you tell me about those?|Logan.Hand]]
<<endif>>
[[I believe you Mr Rutledge. Please, I have more questions|Logan.LastNight]]
[[I'm not convinced Mr Rutledge. |Logan.Accuse]]
[[Thanks Mr Rutledge. That's all for now. May I look around?|Logan.Exit]]

title: Logan.Accuse
body:
Logan: I certainly hope you have some evidence to back that up!
Logan: I think you've overstayed your welcome here officer. I need to speak to my lawyer.
[[I'm not done asking questions, Mr Rutledge|Logan.LastNight]]
[[Fine. Goodbye Mr Rutledge|Logan.Exit]]

title: Logan.Exit
body:
<<if visited ("Logan.Exit") is false>>
<<if visited ("Logan.Accuse")is false>>
Logan: Fine, but please don't break anything.
<<else>>
Logan: Come back with a warrant!
<<endif>>
<<else>>
<<if visited ("Logan.Accuse") is false>>
Logan: Go on then.
<<else>>
Logan: Get the hell out if you have nothing else to ask!
<<endif>>
<<endif>>

title: Logan.Punched
body:
Logan: That... That was me.
Logan: He was so stubborn about his business, and I lost my temper.
Logan: I hit him in the face and left him to drink alone.
[[I believe you Mr Rutledge. Please, I have more questions|Logan.LastNight]]
[[I'm not convinced Mr Rutledge. |Logan.Accuse]]
[[Thanks Mr Rutledge. That's all for now. May I look around?|Logan.Exit]]

title: Logan.Gunshot
body:
Logan: He was shot?
Logan: I abhor guns. I certainly did not shoot him.
[[I believe you Mr Rutledge. Please, I have more questions|Logan.LastNight]]
[[I'm not convinced Mr Rutledge. |Logan.Accuse]]
[[Thanks Mr Rutledge. That's all for now. May I look around?|Logan.Exit]]

title: Logan.Night
body:
Logan: We discussed business. I used to be on the board of his company.
Logan: I left at around half-past six.
[[I believe you Mr Rutledge. Please, I have more questions|Logan.LastNight]]
[[I don't believe you. There must be more to it than that.|Logan.Argument]]
[[Thanks Mr Rutledge. That's all for now. May I look around?|Logan.Exit]]

title: Logan.Intro
body:
Logan: Hello. Can I help you?
-> Hello Mr. Rutledge. I'm Detective Schmidt. May I come in?
    Logan: Yes of course.
-> Hello Mr. Rutledge. I'm with the police. Can I come in?
    Logan: Umm. Okay then.
Logan: What is this about?
-> Mr Rutledge, last night Jacob Wright was murdered.
    Logan: ... I see. Please, come in.
-> Last night Jacob Wright was killed. I'm investigating.
    Logan: Oh... oh God. Come in.
<<FadeScreen LoganEventController>>

title: Logan.Hand
body:
Logan: I.. I punched Jacob and injured my hand, as I said tempers were high. 
[[I believe you Mr Rutledge. Please, I have more questions|Logan.LastNight]]
[[You did more than punch him Mr Rutledge. |Logan.Accuse]]
[[Thanks Mr Rutledge. That's all for now. May I look around?|Logan.Exit]]
